\w You|strong="G4771"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w at|strong="G1093"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G0746"\w* \w did|strong="G1510"\w* put \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w on|strong="G2596"\w* its base, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G2041"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*:
